content: You know that the stars in the sky can see us from thousands of lightyears away? Are we look up at them in awe as we shit in sinks.
Wow, I truly can't believe you drove yourself mad thinking that you could be something more than what you are, a talentless hack, nothing more than the dirt under my boot.
You know you've reached middle age when you're cautioned to slow down by your doctor, instead of by the police.
